info.title: Missouri Medicaid Prototype API
info.description: Prototype API for retrieving data from Missouri Medicaid systems and providing it to consumers in a modern, RESTful way.

get.summary: Get user for an existing token
get.description:
If the Authorization header is set and it's a valid JWT token
signed by the API, this endpoint will decode it and return the
user object that it represents.

200.description: The user represented by the token

401.description:
If the authorization header is missing, is not a valid JWT
token, was not signed by the API, or is expired, the API
will return a 401 status code.

schema.description: A message indicating that the user is not logged in

post.summary: [DUMMY] Log in with username and password
post.description: Send a username and password, get back a user object

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Login username. Currently can be any value.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Login password. Currently can be any value.

200.description: Currently always responds in the affirmative with a dummy user object

get.summary: Checks if a DCN matches a client
get.description: Given a DCN, this method returns true if the DCN is valid and matches a client; otherwise it returns false

200.description: Response if the DCN is valid and matches a real client

404.description: Response if the DCN is valid but does not match a client

realName.description: The user's real name as an arbitrary string.

role.description: The user's role in the system

dcn.description: The department client number for this client

people.description: The people covered by this DCN

primary.description: The full name of the primary client for the DCN

others.description: Full names of all other members on the DCN

address.description: Address of the client; each item in the array corresponds to an address line

period.description: The month and year that this spend down information applies to.  Most likely the current active period.

monthlyAmount.description: The total spend down dollar amount due each month

owed.description: The total spend down dollar amount still owed for coverage to begin

contributions.descriptions: Contributions towards the client's spend down

amount.description: The dollar amount of the contribution

to.description: Who the contribution was paid to or incurred from, or absent for direct contributions

amount.description: The dollar amount of the payment

received.description: The date the payment was received

applied.description: The date the payment was applied

month.description: The coverage month that the payment was applied to

date.description: A data expressed in Javascript epoch time, as the milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970, UTC

coverage-month.description: A start and end date describing one coverage month

start.description: The start date of the month

end.description: The end date of the month
